00019 #include "hough_base.h"
00020 #include "../../ipl98_general_functions.h"
00021 
00022 namespace ipl {
00023 
00024 void CHoughBase::ScaleHoughImage(CStdImage& Source)
00025 {
00026         unsigned int value, x, y, maxColorValue = 0;
00027         
00028         // color scaling to grayscale
00029         for (y=0; y<Source.GetHeight(); y++)
00030         {
00031                 for (x=0; x<Source.GetWidth(); x++)
00032                 {
00033                         value = Source.GetPixelFast(x,y);
00034                         if (value > maxColorValue) maxColorValue = value;         
00035                 }
00036         }
00037         
00038         for (y=0; y<Source.GetHeight(); y++)
00039         {
00040                 for (x=0; x<Source.GetWidth(); x++)
00041                 {
00042                         value = (int) (1.0*Source.GetPixelFast(x,y)/maxColorValue*255);
00043                         Source.SetPixelFast(x,y,255-value);
00044                 }
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 void CHoughBase::DrawLine(CImage& img, const CParameter2D<float>& parameter)
00050 {
00051         vector<int> points = ComputeIntersectionPoints(img, parameter);
00052         //int dist = (int) sqrt(pow(points[0]-points[2],2.0)+pow(points[1]-points[3],2.0));
00053         
00054         points[0] += img.GetWidth()/2;
00055         points[1] = img.GetHeight()/2-points[1];
00056         points[2] += img.GetWidth()/2;
00057         points[3] = img.GetHeight()/2-points[3];
00058         
00059         CPoint2D<int> start((int) points[0], (int) points[1]);
00060         CPoint2D<int> end((int) points[2], (int) points[3]);
00061         // cout << start << " " << end << endl;
00062         img.DrawLine(start, end, 0);
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 vector<int> CHoughBase::ComputeIntersectionPoints(const CImage& img, const CParameter2D<float>& p)
00067 {
00068         
00069         CPoint2D<int> origo((int) img.GetWidth()/2, (int) img.GetHeight()/2);
00070         CParameter2D<float>  left_line((float) 0.0f, -origo.GetX());
00071         CParameter2D<float> right_line((float) 0.0f,  origo.GetX());
00072         CParameter2D<float> upper_line((float) PI/2, -origo.GetY());
00073         CParameter2D<float> lower_line((float) PI/2,  origo.GetY());
00074         
00075         CPoint2D<float> left_intersection =  p.NormalLineIntersection(left_line);
00076         CPoint2D<float> right_intersection = p.NormalLineIntersection(right_line);
00077         CPoint2D<float> lower_intersection = p.NormalLineIntersection(lower_line);
00078         CPoint2D<float> upper_intersection = p.NormalLineIntersection(upper_line);
00079         CPoint2D<float> parallel(0.0f,0.0f);
00080         
00081         
00082         CPoint2D<float> p1, p2;
00083         
00084         int left = 2;
00085         if(left_intersection.GetY()>=-origo.GetY() && left_intersection.GetY()<=origo.GetY() && 
00086                 left_intersection != parallel && left>0)
00087         {
00088                 p1 = left_intersection;
00089                 left--;
00090                 // cout << "found LEFT" << endl;
00091         }
00092         if(right_intersection.GetY()>=-origo.GetY() && right_intersection.GetY()<=origo.GetY() && 
00093                 right_intersection != parallel && left>0)
00094         {
00095                 if (left == 2) {
00096                         p1 = right_intersection;
00097                 } else if (left == 1) {
00098                         p2 = right_intersection;
00099                 }
00100                 left--;
00101                 // cout << "found RIGHT" << endl;
00102         }
00103         if(lower_intersection.GetX()>=-origo.GetX() && lower_intersection.GetX()<=origo.GetX() && 
00104                 lower_intersection != parallel && left>0)
00105         {
00106                 if (left == 2) {
00107                         p1 = lower_intersection;
00108                 } else if (left == 1) {
00109                         p2 = lower_intersection;
00110                 }
00111                 left--;
00112                 // cout << "found LOWER" << endl;
00113         }
00114         if(upper_intersection.GetX()>=-origo.GetX() && upper_intersection.GetX()<=origo.GetX() && 
00115                 upper_intersection != parallel && left>0)
00116         {
00117                 p2 = upper_intersection;
00118                 left--;
00119                 // cout << "found UPPER" << endl;
00120         }
00121         
00122         vector<int> points;
00123         points.push_back((int) p1.GetX());
00124         points.push_back((int) p1.GetY());
00125         points.push_back((int) p2.GetX());
00126         points.push_back((int) p2.GetY());
00127         return points;
00128 }
00129 
00130 } // end namespace ipl
